ai-iti78:1.1_0: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
ai-iti78:2.1_0: “Mendicants, sentient beings come together and converge because of an element:
ai-iti78:2.2_0: Those who have a bad attitude come together and converge with those who have a bad attitude.
ai-iti78:2.3_0: Those who have a good attitude come together and converge with those who have a good attitude.
ai-iti78:3.2_0: Those who have a fixed attachments come together and converge with those beings.
ai-iti78:3.3_0: Those who have a good attitude come together and converge with those who have a good attitude.
ai-iti78:4.2_0: Those who have a bad attitude come together and converge with those who have a conversion.
ai-iti78:4.3_0: Those who have a good attitude come together and converge with those who have a good attitude.
ai-iti78:5.1_0: At present, too, sentient beings come together and converge because of an element.
ai-iti78:5.2_0: Those who have a bad attitude come together and converge with those who have a bad attitude.
ai-iti78:5.3_0: Those who have a good attitude come together and converge with those who have a good attitude.”
ai-iti78:5.4_0: That is what the Buddha said.
ai-iti78:6.3_0: If you’re lost in the middle of a great sea,
ai-iti78:6.4_0: Like a lion in the great ocean,
ai-iti78:7.1_0: So too, a person who lives well
ai-iti78:7.2_0: sinks by relying on a lazy person.
ai-iti78:9.1_0: This too was spoken by the Blessed One: that is what I heard.
